settings.heading: Thank you.
settings.lead_paragraph:
As the Nothing ecosystem expands, we wanted to say thank you to those that have believed in us since the beginning.

So if you currently own a Nothing product or you’re one of our community Black Dot holders, we’re giving you an exclusive 10% discount code for Ear (stick).

Your opportunity to experience our most advanced audio product yet, for less.

Sign up or login to your Nothing account to get started.
settings.step_2_lead_paragraph:
Once you have passed the 30-day cancellation period for your Phone (1), you are eligible to claim your Ear (stick). Here’s what to do next:

1.Create an account on nothing.tech if you haven’t already and sign in.
2.Enter your Phone (1) IMEI number for verification.
3.Once your IMEI number is verified, you can upload your proof of purchase to receive your discount code.
4.Enter the code at checkout when you buy Ear (stick).

1 discount per device.
settings.submit_lead_paragraph: Please enter your IMEI number in the box below. Find your IMEI number for Phone (1) in Settings>About phone.
settings.upload_text:
Proof of purchase
Please upload an invoice as a proof of purchase for your Phone (1). Select a file and upload in the box below.
settings.upload_note: The file type should be JPG or PNG.
settings.error_text: Unfortunately, the information you provided has not been recognised. Please double check and try again.
settings.shop_now_text: Enter at checkout when you buy Ear (stick) to redeem. SHOP NOW
